Acure Incredibly Clear Cleansing Stick (2019 formulation)

Brand: Acure

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: GLYCERIN, SODIUM COCOYL ISETHIONATE, STEARIC ACID, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, WATER, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, POLYSORBATE 80, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, LACTIC ACID, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIP) FRUIT OIL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL,

80, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, LACTIC ACID, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, ROSA CANINA (ROSEHIP) FRUIT OIL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, CEREUS GRANDIFLORUS (CACTUS) FLOWER EXTRACT, DIHEPTYL SUCCINATE, CAPRYLOYL GLYCERIN/SEBACIC ACID COPOLYMER, LAVANDULA

CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL, MACROCYSTIS PYRIFERA (KELP) EXTRACT, CEREUS GRANDIFLORUS (CACTUS) FLOWER EXTRACT, DIHEPTYL SUCCINATE, CAPRYLOYL GLYCERIN/SEBACIC ACID COPOLYMER, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER OIL, MENTHA PIPERITA (PEPPERMINT) LEAF OIL.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
